.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.1.0 (2014-29-06)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release on PyPI.


0.1.1 (2014-30-06)
++++++++++++++++++

* Add support for retrying builds


0.1.2 (2014-07-07)
++++++++++++++++++

* Add support for clearing cache 


0.1.3 (2014-25-07)
++++++++++++++++++

* Add support for parametrized builds
* Add support for listing build artifacts
